name: Picross 3D
description:
Track the numbers to uncover the hidden shape! Tap a chisel to eliminate blocks you think don't belong or use a paintbrush to mark ones you think should stay. Beginners and Picross veterans alike will love this puzzle game that's easy to pick up, but hard to put down!

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
